result.ga: an bhfuil tú ar thóir an ghrá

result.html: an bhfuil tú ar thóir an ghráAre you looking for love?
result.ponchtml: an ḃfuil tú ar ṫóir an ġráAre you looking for love?

result.eng: The only cure for love is marriage.
result.ga: níl leigheas ar ghrá ach pósadh
result.orig: Níl leigheas ar ghrá ach pósadh
result.html: níl leigheas ar ghrá ach pósadhThe only cure for love is marriage.
result.ponchtml: níl leiġeas ar ġrá aċ pósaḋThe only cure for love is marriage.

result.eng: She fell in love with a married man.
result.ga: thit sí i ngrá le fear pósta
result.orig: Thit sí i ngrá le fear pósta
result.html: thit sí i ngrá le fear póstaShe fell in love with a married man.
result.ponchtml: ṫit sí i ngrá le fear póstaShe fell in love with a married man.

result.ga: tá mé i ngrá leat
result.html: tá mé i ngrá leatI love you.
result.ponchtml: tá mé i ngrá leatI love you.

result.eng: I will make you fall in love with me after we're married!
result.ga: tabharfaidh mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósadh
result.orig: Tabharfaidh mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósadh
result.html: tabharfaidh mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósadhI will make you fall in love with me after we're married!
result.ponchtml: taḃarfaiḋ mé ort titim i ngrá liom tar éis dúinn pósaḋI will make you fall in love with me after we're married!

result.eng: I love bridges but this was not the reason of my visit.
result.ga: tá grá agam do dhroichid ach níorbh é seo fáth mo chuairte
result.orig: Tá grá agam do dhroichid ach níorbh é seo fáth mo chuairte
result.html: tá grá agam do dhroichid ach níorbh é seo fáth mo chuairteI love bridges but this was not the reason of my visit.
result.ponchtml: tá grá agam do ḋroiċid aċ níorḃ é seo fáṫ mo ċuairteI love bridges but this was not the reason of my visit.

result.eng: There is no describing the love I had for that girl.
result.ga: níl léamh nó scríobh nó inse béil ar an ghrá a thug mise don chailín udaí
result.orig: Níl léamh nó scríobh nó inse béil ar an ghrá a thug mise don chailín udaí
result.html: níl léamh nó scríobh nó inse béil ar an ghrá a thug mise don chailín udaíThere is no describing the love I had for that girl.
result.ponchtml: níl léaṁ nó scríoḃ nó inse béil ar an ġrá a ṫug mise don ċailín udaíThere is no describing the love I had for that girl.

result.eng: Don't ever fall in love with a woman.
result.ga: ná thabhair grá do chroí choíche do mhnaoi
result.orig: Ná thabhair grá do chroí choíche do mhnaoi
result.html: ná thabhair grá do chroí choíche do mhnaoiDon't ever fall in love with a woman.
result.ponchtml: ná ṫaḃair grá do ċroí ċoíċe do ṁnaoiDon't ever fall in love with a woman.
